thread.title: Verhofstadt to Tsipras: 'Show that you are a real leader, not a false prophet!'
thread.title_full: Verhofstadt to Tsipras: 'Show that you are a real leader, not a false prophet!' | EurActiv

author: euractiv.com
title: Verhofstadt to Tsipras: 'Show that you are a real leader, not a false prophet!'
text:
“I am angry because you are talking about reforms, but we never see concrete proposals,” ALDE leader Guy Verhofstadt said during a plenary session in Strasbourg.
“I am angry because we are in fact sleepwalking towards a Grexit. 80% of your people want to stay in Europe and in the eurozone,” Verhofstadt added.
